Description: Dagger comprising a bronze blade, with runnels, grip made of horn (?) and discoid butt made of ivory, the handle is inlaid.
Exhibition history: 1989 Jan-Mar, South Florida Science Museum, Imhotep's Egypt: Discovering Ancient Egyptian Technology 1989 Apr-Jun, Miami, Museum of Science, Imhotep's Egypt: Discovering Ancient Egyptian Technology 1989 Jul-Aug, Jacksonville Museum of Science History, Imhotep's Egypt: Discovering Ancient Egyptian Technology 1997 May-Oct, Museum of St.Albans, Ancient Egypt
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Robert Ludwig Mond
